first_night_info.name: Drunk
first_night_info.description: Assign which Townsfolk is actually the Drunk.

first_night_info.name: Wraith
first_night_info.description: Wake the Wraith tonight whenever other evil players wake. If the Wraith is drunk or poisoned, show them DO NOT OPEN YOUR EYES TONIGHT.

first_night_info.name: Djinn
first_night_info.description: Inform the group of all Djinn special rules for this game.

first_night_info.name: Bootlegger
first_night_info.description: Inform the group of all homebrew characters or rules for this game.

first_night_info.name: Lord of Typhon
first_night_info.description:
Wake the appropriate number of minions around the Lord of Typhon.
 Show them YOU ARE and a unique Minion token, tell them YOU ARE EVIL, and put them to sleep.

first_night_info.name: Kazali
first_night_info.description: The Kazali points to a player and a Minion on the character sheet. They do this for as many Minions as should be in play. Change those players' tokens to the chosen Minion tokens. Wake those players, show them the YOU ARE card, the Minions they have become, and a thumbs down.

first_night_info.name: Apprentice
first_night_info.description: Show the Apprentice the YOU ARE card, then a Townsfolk or Minion token. In the Grimoire, replace the Apprentice token with that character token, and put the Apprentice's 'Is The Apprentice' reminder by that character token.

first_night_info.name: Barista
first_night_info.description: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).

first_night_info.name: Bureaucrat
first_night_info.description: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 Votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

first_night_info.name: Thief
first_night_info.description: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative Vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

first_night_info.name: Boffin
first_night_info.description: Show the Boffin and the Demon the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token, then the Boffin token, then the good character's token.

first_night_info.name: Philosopher
first_night_info.description:
The Philosopher might pick a good character.
If they chose a character:
 Give them that ability.
 If the character is in play, make them drunk.

first_night_info.name: Alchemist
first_night_info.description: Show the Alchemist the Minion token of the ability they have

first_night_info.name: Poppy Grower
first_night_info.description: Do not inform the Demon/Minions who each other are

first_night_info.name: Yaggababble
first_night_info.description: Show the Yaggababble their secret phrase.

first_night_info.name: Minion Info
first_night_info.description:
If 7 or more players:
 Wake all Minions. Show the THIS IS THE DEMON token.
 Point to the Demon.

first_night_info.name: Snitch
first_night_info.description: After Minion info wake each Minion and show them three not-in-play character tokens. These may be the same or different to each other and the ones shown to the Demon.

first_night_info.name: Lunatic
first_night_info.description:
If 7 or more players:
 Show THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS. Point to "Minions".
 Show three bluffs.
 Put the Lunatic to sleep.
Wake the demon. Show the YOU ARE token, and the Demon token.
Show THIS PLAYER IS and the Lunatic token, point to the Lunatic.

first_night_info.name: Summoner
first_night_info.description: Show the Summoner THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY and three bluffs.

first_night_info.name: Demon Info
first_night_info.description:
If there are 7 or more players:
 Wake the Demon.
 Show the THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS token. Point to all Minions.
 Show THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY and three bluffs.

first_night_info.name: Storm Catcher
first_night_info.description:
If the named character is in play, show the evil players THIS PLAYER IS and the character token.
If not, show them STORM CAUGHT CHARACTER IS NOT IN PLAY.

first_night_info.name: King
first_night_info.description: Wake the Demon, show them THIS PLAYER IS and point to the King player.

first_night_info.name: Sailor
first_night_info.description: The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.

first_night_info.name: Marionette
first_night_info.description: Select one of the good players next to the Demon and mark them with Is the Marionette. Wake the Demon and show them THIS PLAYER IS and the Marionette token.

first_night_info.name: Engineer
first_night_info.description: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the YOU ARE card and the relevant character tokens.

first_night_info.name: Preacher
first_night_info.description: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU card and then the Preacher token.

first_night_info.name: Lil’ Monsta
first_night_info.description: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.

first_night_info.name: Lleech
first_night_info.description: The Lleech points to a player. Place the Poisoned reminder token.

first_night_info.name: Xaan
first_night_info.description: If there is 1 Outsider, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk.

first_night_info.name: Poisoner
first_night_info.description: The Poisoner picks a player to poison.

first_night_info.name: Widow
first_night_info.description: Show the Grimoire to the Widow for as long as they need. The Widow points to a player. That player is poisoned. Wake a good player. Show the THIS CHARACTER IS IN PLAY card, then the Widow character token.

first_night_info.name: Courtier
first_night_info.description:
The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet.
If the Courtier used their ability:
If that character is in play, that player is drunk.

first_night_info.name: Wizard
first_night_info.description: If the Wizard's wish requires actions at night, run these.

first_night_info.name: Snake Charmer
first_night_info.description:
The Snake Charmer points to a player.
If that player is the Demon:
 swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments.
 Wake each player and show them YOU ARE and their new role and alignment.
The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.

first_night_info.name: Godfather
first_night_info.description: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play.

first_night_info.name: Organ Grinder
first_night_info.description: Wake the Organ Grinder. If they give the 'yes' head signal, mark them Drunk. If they give the 'no' head signal, remove the Drunk reminder.

first_night_info.name: Devil’s Advocate
first_night_info.description: The Devil's Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.

first_night_info.name: Evil Twin
first_night_info.description: Wake the Evil Twin and their twin. Confirm that they have acknowledged each other. Point to the Evil Twin. Show their Evil Twin token to the twin player. Point to the twin. Show their character token to the Evil Twin player.

first_night_info.name: Witch
first_night_info.description: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.

first_night_info.name: Cerenovus
first_night_info.description:
The Cerenovus chooses a player and character. Wake the target.
Show THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU, the Cerenovus token, and the madness character.

first_night_info.name: Fearmonger
first_night_info.description: The Fearmonger points to a player. Place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.

first_night_info.name: Harpy
first_night_info.description: The Harpy chooses two players. Mark both Harpy selected. Tell the first player THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU and point to the second player.

first_night_info.name: Mezepheles
first_night_info.description: Show the Mezepheles their secret word.

first_night_info.name: Pukka
first_night_info.description: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned.

first_night_info.name: Pixie
first_night_info.description: Show the Pixie 1 in-play Townsfolk character token.

first_night_info.name: Huntsman
first_night_info.description: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the YOU ARE card and a not-in-play character token.

first_night_info.name: Damsel
first_night_info.description: Wake all the Minions, show them THIS CHARACTER IS IN PLAY and the Damsel token.

first_night_info.name: Amnesiac
first_night_info.description:
Decide the Amnesiac's entire ability.
If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight:
Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.

first_night_info.name: Washerwoman
first_night_info.description: Show a Townsfolk token and two players.

first_night_info.name: Librarian
first_night_info.description: Show an Outsider token and two players.

first_night_info.name: Investigator
first_night_info.description: Show a Minion token and two players.

first_night_info.name: Chef
first_night_info.description: Show the number of pairs of neighboring evil players.

first_night_info.name: Empath
first_night_info.description: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbors.

first_night_info.name: Fortune Teller
first_night_info.description: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give a yes if one is the Demon (or red herring).

first_night_info.name: Butler
first_night_info.description: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.

first_night_info.name: Grandmother
first_night_info.description: Show the marked character token. Point to the marked player.

first_night_info.name: Clockmaker
first_night_info.description: Show the number of places from Demon to closest Minion.

first_night_info.name: Dreamer
first_night_info.description: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.

first_night_info.name: Seamstress
first_night_info.description: The Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.

first_night_info.name: Steward
first_night_info.description: Point to the player marked Know (who is good).

first_night_info.name: Knight
first_night_info.description: Point to the two players marked Know (one is the Demon).

first_night_info.name: Noble
first_night_info.description: Point to 3 players including one evil player, in no particular order.

first_night_info.name: Balloonist
first_night_info.description: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.

first_night_info.name: Shugenja
first_night_info.description: Wake the Shugenja. Point horizontally in the direction of the closest evil player.

first_night_info.name: Village Idiot
first_night_info.description: Choose an extra Village Idiot to be drunk. Each Village Idiot chooses a player. Show them the alignment of that player.

first_night_info.name: Bounty Hunter
first_night_info.description: Point to 1 evil player. Wake the townsfolk who is evil and show them YOU ARE EVIL and the thumbs-down sign.

first_night_info.name: Nightwatchman
first_night_info.description: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.

first_night_info.name: Cult Leader
first_night_info.description: The Cult Leader might change alignment to match an alive neighbor. If it changed, tell the Cult Leader YOU ARE EVIL or YOU ARE GOOD.

first_night_info.name: Spy
first_night_info.description: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.

first_night_info.name: Ogre
first_night_info.description: The Ogre points to a player (not themselves) and becomes their alignment.

first_night_info.name: High Priestess
first_night_info.description: Point to a player the High Priestess should talk to.

first_night_info.name: General
first_night_info.description: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.

first_night_info.name: Chambermaid
first_night_info.description: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.

first_night_info.name: Mathematician
first_night_info.description: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.

first_night_info.name: Leviathan
first_night_info.description: Place the Leviathan 'Day 1' marker. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play. This is Day 1.'

first_night_info.name: Vizier
first_night_info.description: Announce which player is the Vizier.

other_nights_info.name: Wraith
other_nights_info.description: Wake the Wraith tonight whenever other evil players wake. If the Wraith is drunk or poisoned, show them DO NOT OPEN YOUR EYES TONIGHT.

other_nights_info.name: Toymaker
other_nights_info.description:
If it is a night when a Demon attack could end the game, and the Demon is marked “Final night:
No Attack,” then the Demon does not act tonight. (Do not wake them.)

other_nights_info.name: Duchess
other_nights_info.description: Wake each player marked “Visitor” or “False Info” one at a time. Show them the Duchess token, then fingers (1, 2, 3) equaling the number of evil players marked “Visitor” or, if YOU ARE waking the player marked “False Info,” show them any number of fingers except the number of evil players marked “Visitor.”

other_nights_info.name: Barista
other_nights_info.description: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).

other_nights_info.name: Cacklejack
other_nights_info.description: Replace the character token of any player (besides the player the Cacklejack chose today) with a different character token. Wake that player and show them the YOU ARE card and their new character token.

other_nights_info.name: Bureaucrat
other_nights_info.description: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 Votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

other_nights_info.name: Thief
other_nights_info.description: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative Vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

other_nights_info.name: Harlot
other_nights_info.description: The Harlot points at any player. Then, put the Harlot to sleep. Wake the chosen player, show them the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token, then the Harlot token. That player either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nodded their head yes, wake the Harlot and show them the chosen player's character token. Then, you may decide that both players die.

other_nights_info.name: Bone Collector
other_nights_info.description: The Bone Collector either shakes their head no or points at any dead player. If they pointed at any dead player, put the Bone Collector's 'Has Ability' reminder by the chosen player's character token. (They may need to be woken tonight to use it.)

other_nights_info.name: Cannibal
other_nights_info.description: Mark the recently killed executee with the 'Lunch' token. If they are good, the Cannibal will wake tonight when the executee would have woken. If they are evil, mark the Cannibal as 'Poisoned'. The Storyteller may pretend that the Cannibal has any ability.

other_nights_info.name: Philosopher
other_nights_info.description:
The Philosopher might pick a good character.
If they chose a character:
 Give them that ability.
 If the character is in play, make them drunk.

other_nights_info.name: Poppy Grower
other_nights_info.description: If the Poppy Grower has died, show the Minions/Demon who each other are.

other_nights_info.name: Sailor
other_nights_info.description: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.

other_nights_info.name: Engineer
other_nights_info.description: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the YOU ARE card and the relevant character tokens.

other_nights_info.name: Preacher
other_nights_info.description: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU card and then the Preacher token.

other_nights_info.name: Xaan
other_nights_info.description: If it is Night X, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk.

other_nights_info.name: Poisoner
other_nights_info.description: The Poisoner picks a player to poison.

other_nights_info.name: Courtier
other_nights_info.description:
Reduce the remaining number of days the marked player is poisoned.
If the Courtier has not yet used their ability:
The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet.
If the Courtier used their ability:
If that character is in play, that player is drunk.

other_nights_info.name: Innkeeper
other_nights_info.description: The Innkeeper points to two players, who are both safe from the Demon. One is drunk.

other_nights_info.name: Wizard
other_nights_info.description: If the Wizard's wish requires actions at night, run these.

other_nights_info.name: Gambler
other_nights_info.description: The Gambler points to a player, and a character on their sheet. If incorrect, the Gambler dies.

other_nights_info.name: Acrobat
other_nights_info.description: The Acrobat points to a player. If that player is or becomes drunk or poisoned tonight, the Acrobat dies.

other_nights_info.name: Snake Charmer
other_nights_info.description:
The Snake Charmer points to a player.
If that player is the Demon:
 swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments.
 Wake each player and show them YOU ARE and their new role and alignment.
The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.

other_nights_info.name: Monk
other_nights_info.description: The Monk protects a player from the Demon.

other_nights_info.name: Organ Grinder
other_nights_info.description: Wake the Organ Grinder. If they give the 'yes' head signal, mark them Drunk. If they give the 'no' head signal, remove the Drunk reminder.

other_nights_info.name: Devil’s Advocate
other_nights_info.description: The Devil's Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.

other_nights_info.name: Witch
other_nights_info.description:
If there are 4 or more players alive:
The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.

other_nights_info.name: Cerenovus
other_nights_info.description:
The Cerenovus chooses a player and character. Wake the target.
Show THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU, the Cerenovus token, and the madness character.

other_nights_info.name: Pit-Hag
other_nights_info.description: The Pit-Hag points to a player and a character on the sheet. If this character is not in play, wake that player and show them the YOU ARE card and the relevant character token. If the character is in play, nothing happens.

other_nights_info.name: Fearmonger
other_nights_info.description: The Fearmonger points to a player. If different from the previous night, place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.

other_nights_info.name: Harpy
other_nights_info.description: The Harpy chooses two players. Mark both Harpy selected. Tell the first player THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU and point to the second player.

other_nights_info.name: Mezepheles
other_nights_info.description: Wake the 1st good player that said the Mezepheles' secret word and show them YOU ARE EVIL and the thumbs-down sign.

other_nights_info.name: Scarlet Woman
other_nights_info.description:
If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today:
Show the YOU ARE card, then the demon token.

other_nights_info.name: Summoner
other_nights_info.description:
If it is the 3rd night, wake the Summoner.
 They point to a player and a Demon on the character sheet - that player becomes that Demon.
 Show the player YOU ARE and the demon token, and YOU ARE EVIL.

other_nights_info.name: Lunatic
other_nights_info.description: Do whatever is needed to simulate the demon.

other_nights_info.name: Exorcist
other_nights_info.description:
The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night.
If that player is the Demon:
 Wake the Demon.
 Show THIS PLAYER IS and the Exorcist.
 The Demon does not act tonight.

other_nights_info.name: Lycanthrope
other_nights_info.description: The Lycanthrope points to a living player: if good, they die and the Demon does not kill tonight.

other_nights_info.name: Princess
other_nights_info.description: If it was the Princess' first day today, and they nominated and executed a player, the Demon doesn't kill.

other_nights_info.name: Legion
other_nights_info.description: The Storyteller may choose a player, that player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Imp
other_nights_info.description:
The Imp kills a player. If they chose themselves,
replace an alive Minion with an Imp token. Show them YOU ARE and then the Imp token.

other_nights_info.name: Zombuul
other_nights_info.description:
If no-one died during the day:
The Zombuul points to a player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Pukka
other_nights_info.description: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Shabaloth
other_nights_info.description: One player that the Shabaloth chose the previous night might be resurrected. The Shabaloth points to two players. Those players die.

other_nights_info.name: Po
other_nights_info.description:
If the Po chose no-one the previous night:
The Po points to three players. Otherwise: The Po either shows the 'no' head signal , or points to a player. Chosen players die

other_nights_info.name: Fang Gu
other_nights_info.description:
The Fang Gu points to a player. That player dies.
If an outsider was closen and there is no other Fang Gu, the Fang Gu dies and show YOU ARE EVIL and YOU ARE Fang Go to the outsider.

other_nights_info.name: No Dashii
other_nights_info.description: The No Dashii points to a player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Vortox
other_nights_info.description: The Vortox points to a player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Lord of Typhon
other_nights_info.description: The Lord of Typhon chooses a player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Vigormortis
other_nights_info.description: The Vigormortis points to a player. That player dies. If a Minion, they keep their ability and one of their Townsfolk neighbors is poisoned.

other_nights_info.name: Ojo
other_nights_info.description: The Ojo chooses a character. If that character is in play, that player dies. If that character is not in play, choose any player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Al-Hadikhia
other_nights_info.description: The Al-Hadikhia might choose 3 players. If so, announce the first player, wake them to nod yes to live or shake head no to die, kill or resurrect accordingly, then put to sleep and announce the next player. If all 3 are alive after this, all 3 die.

other_nights_info.name: Lleech
other_nights_info.description: The Lleech points to a player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Lil’ Monsta
other_nights_info.description: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.

other_nights_info.name: Yaggababble
other_nights_info.description: Choose a number of players up to the total number of times the Yaggababble said their secret phrase publicly; those players die.

other_nights_info.name: Kazali
other_nights_info.description: The Kazali chooses a player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Assassin
other_nights_info.description:
If the Assassin has not yet used their ability:
The Assassin either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Godfather
other_nights_info.description:
If an Outsider died today:
The Godfather points to a player. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Gossip
other_nights_info.description:
If the Gossip's public statement was true:
Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.

other_nights_info.name: Hatter
other_nights_info.description: If the Hatter died, show the Minion and Demon players the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU and allow them to pick a new character.

other_nights_info.name: Barber
other_nights_info.description:
If the Barber died today:
Wake the Demon. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU card, then Barber token. The Demon either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to 2 players.
If they chose players: Swap the character tokens. Wake each player. Show YOU ARE, then their new character token.

other_nights_info.name: Sweetheart
other_nights_info.description: Choose a player that is drunk.

other_nights_info.name: Sage
other_nights_info.description:
If the Sage was killed by a Demon:
Point to two players, one of which is that Demon.

other_nights_info.name: Banshee
other_nights_info.description: If the Demon kills the Banshee, announce that the Banshee has awoken.

other_nights_info.name: Professor
other_nights_info.description:
If the Professor has not used their ability:
The Professor either shakes their head no, or points to a player. If that player is a Townsfolk, they are now alive.

other_nights_info.name: Choirboy
other_nights_info.description: If the King was killed by the Demon, wake the Choirboy and point to the Demon player.

other_nights_info.name: Huntsman
other_nights_info.description: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the YOU ARE card and a not-in-play character token.

other_nights_info.name: Damsel
other_nights_info.description: If selected by the Huntsman, wake the Damsel, show YOU ARE card and a not-in-play Townsfolk token.

other_nights_info.name: Amnesiac
other_nights_info.description:
If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight:
Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.

other_nights_info.name: Farmer
other_nights_info.description: If a Farmer died tonight, choose another good player and make them the Farmer. Wake this player, and show them the YOU ARE card and the Farmer character token.

other_nights_info.name: Tinker
other_nights_info.description: The Tinker might die.

other_nights_info.name: Moonchild
other_nights_info.description:
If the Moonchild used their ability to target a player today:
If that player is good, they die.

other_nights_info.name: Grandmother
other_nights_info.description:
If the Grandmother's grandchild was killed by the Demon tonight:
The Grandmother dies.

other_nights_info.name: Ravenkeeper
other_nights_info.description:
If the Ravenkeeper died tonight:
The Ravenkeeper points to a player. Show that player's character token.

other_nights_info.name: Empath
other_nights_info.description: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbors.

other_nights_info.name: Fortune Teller
other_nights_info.description: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give a yes if one is the Demon (or red herring).

other_nights_info.name: Undertaker
other_nights_info.description:
If a player was executed today:
Show that player's character token.

other_nights_info.name: Dreamer
other_nights_info.description: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.

other_nights_info.name: Flowergirl
other_nights_info.description: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether the Demon voted today. Place the 'Demon Not Voted' marker (remove 'Demon Voted', if any).

other_nights_info.name: Town Crier
other_nights_info.description: Give a 'yes' or 'no' for if a Minion nominated today.

other_nights_info.name: Oracle
other_nights_info.description: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of dead evil players.

other_nights_info.name: Seamstress
other_nights_info.description:
If the Seamstress has not yet used their ability:
the Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.

other_nights_info.name: Juggler
other_nights_info.description:
If today was the Juggler's first day:
Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of 'Correct' markers. Remove markers.

other_nights_info.name: Balloonist
other_nights_info.description: Choose a character type that does not yet have a Seen reminder next to a character of that type. Point to a player whose character is of that type, if there are any. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.

other_nights_info.name: Village Idiot
other_nights_info.description: Each Village Idiot chooses a player. Show them the alignment of that player.

other_nights_info.name: King
other_nights_info.description: If dead equal or outnumber the living, show the King a character token of a living player.

other_nights_info.name: Bounty Hunter
other_nights_info.description: If the known evil player has died, point to another evil player.

other_nights_info.name: Nightwatchman
other_nights_info.description: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.

other_nights_info.name: Cult Leader
other_nights_info.description: The Cult Leader might change alignment to match an alive neighbor. If it changed, tell the Cult Leader YOU ARE EVIL or YOU ARE GOOD.

other_nights_info.name: Butler
other_nights_info.description: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.

other_nights_info.name: Spy
other_nights_info.description: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.

other_nights_info.name: High Priestess
other_nights_info.description: Point to a player the High Priestess should talk to.

other_nights_info.name: General
other_nights_info.description: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.

other_nights_info.name: Chambermaid
other_nights_info.description: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.

other_nights_info.name: Mathematician
other_nights_info.description: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.

other_nights_info.name: Leviathan
other_nights_info.description: Change the Leviathan Day reminder for the next day.
